summary: Two young wolves at opposite ends of their pack's social order are thrown together into a foreign land and need each other to return home, but love complicates everything.
cast: Justin Long|Hayden Panettiere|Dennis Hopper|Danny Glover|Larry Miller|Eric Price|Vicki Lewis|Christina Ricci|Chris Carmack|Brian Donovan|Kevin Sussman|Maya Kay|Christine Lakin|Marilyn Tokuda|Eric Lopez|Paul Nakauchi|Elizabeth Tulloch|Mela Lee|Nika Futterman|Fred Tatasciore|Mindy Sterling|Steve Vinovich|Marcelo Tubert|Toby Huss|Jason Ortenberg|Andrew Ortenberg|Aziz Ansari|Ben Gluck|John Todd|Ayn Olivia Vaughan
title: Alpha y Omega
